title: I2C Output Component Definition
description: I2C Output component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

published.description: If True, this component is supported by the current firmware version and will be displayed to all users. Otherwise, it is hidden behind a developer toggle so that contributors can still work on it against the production site.

description.description: A brief description describing this component's capabilities.

vendor.description: Name of the company that makes this component.

i2cAddresses.description: List of supported I2C addresses for this component.

outputType.description: The type of i2c output component. Corresponds to `I2cOutputAdd` in i2c.proto

charLcdColumns.description: The number of columns for a character LCD. Corresponds to `CharLCDConfig` in i2c.proto.

charLcdRows.description: The number of rows for a character LCD. Corresponds to `CharLCDConfig` in i2c.proto.

ledBackpackAlignment.description: The alignment for the LED backpack. Corresponds to `LedBackpackConfig` in i2c.proto. Defaults to RIGHT.

ledBackpackBrightness.description: The brightness of a LED backpack. Corresponds to `CharLCDConfig` in i2c.proto.
